meanings.definition: A hybrid organism that exhibits heterosis.
meanings.sent1: The farmer was proud of his heterotic chickens that laid more eggs than usual.
meanings.sent2: The biologist studied the heterotic properties of the new species.
meanings.sent3: The heterotic frog leaped farther than any other in the pond.
meanings.sent4: The race car was a heterotic marvel, combining speed and efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The garden showcased a variety of heterotic plants, each unique in its growth.
